name: Ricochet Rampage!
description:
My submission for the MashUp-Games MashUp Game Jam 2021. This project was made over the span of 72 hours. All art, music and code are made within the Jam time and yours truly as per the Jam requirements.

The theme for the Jam was 'Unconventional Means', so what better way to exercise an Unconvential Mean than to mandate a Ricochet in your shot towards your enemies in order to be deemed cool enough for a kill.

This is my 3rd Game Jam thus far, and I'm glad to see an improvement in all areas of my craft. Leave a comment, like, or whatever you want to leave on this page. 

Onwards and Upwards!
